nodes.text: Bettok was an astronomical object located in the Bettok system, a part of the Velcar sector in the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. The Human TIE fighter pilot Creb of the Galactic Empire was born at Bettok in 20 BBY.

Bettok was mentioned in Dark Force Rising Sourcebook, a 1992 supplement authored by Bill Slavicsek for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Bettok system, and therefore the celestial body itself, in grid square J-4.
